place_of_publication.publication_title: in N. L. Britton et al., N. Amer. Fl.

treatment.description: Plants to 20 cm. Leaves 8–25 mm (linear to oblanceolate), usually 3-lobed. Peduncles 20–50 mm. Phyllaries 3–8, connate at bases, elliptic to lanceolate. Ray florets 3–8. Disc florets 8–25+; tubes cylindric, abruptly dilated (throats broadly funnelform), lobes glabrous. Cypselae 1.5–2.5 mm. 2n = 8.
treatment.habitat: grasslands or openings in foothill woodlands
